# Dice UI Components

Dice UI components integrated and adapted for the Digital Garden design system.

## Source

All components are from [Dice UI](https://www.diceui.com/).

## Components

### Forms

- Editable - [Source](https://www.diceui.com/docs/components/editable)
- SegmentedInput - [Source](https://www.diceui.com/docs/components/segmented-input)
- MaskInput - [Source](https://www.diceui.com/docs/components/mask-input)
- TagsInput - [Source](https://www.diceui.com/docs/components/tags-input)
- Rating - [Source](https://www.diceui.com/docs/components/rating)
- TimePicker - [Source](https://www.diceui.com/docs/components/time-picker)
- Listbox - [Source](https://www.diceui.com/docs/components/listbox)
- FileUpload - [Source](https://www.diceui.com/docs/components/file-upload)

### Data Display

- Stat - [Source](https://www.diceui.com/docs/components/stat)
- Gauge - [Source](https://www.diceui.com/docs/components/gauge)
- CircularProgress - [Source](https://www.diceui.com/docs/components/circular-progress)
